page.title: 11Entertainment--Cockermouth
page.content: The whole area is alive with music and drama all the year. Young and old make entertainment. The venue for many community concerts is All Saints' Church. The Mechanics' Band rehearses in the Church Rooms. They play selections of brass band music at major events in town and elsewhere. The Schools' Music Co-ordinator stages choral concerts for primary children. There is a Community Choir, Castlegate Singers for women, senior school band and orchestra all under his direction. C.A.D.S.rehearses and performs much of its dramatic entertainment in the newly restored Victoria Hall. This group includes plays of local interest and dialogue. There are two shows a year. There is a Folk Club which performs in the Black Bull and other pubs have their own popular entertainers.
